body: Wouldn't it be better to have either a single hook that gets all outputs (and maybe calls other hooks with some of them), or a number of hooks from all outputs to all outputs?
body_html: Wouldn't it be better to have either a single hook that gets all outputs (and maybe calls other hooks with some of them), or a number of hooks from all outputs to all outputs?
body_text: Wouldn't it be better to have either a single hook that gets all outputs (and maybe calls other hooks with some of them), or a number of hooks from all outputs to all outputs?
